name: Luminous Bonds
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] Los cantos bajo [AttackerHisOrHer] respirando como [AttackerHeOrShe] aprovecha el fondo del personal [AttackerHisOrHer] en el suelo, y la energía dorada aparece repentinamente alrededor de las muñecas y los tobillos de [TargetName], restringiendo [TargetHimOrHer]!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] chants under [AttackerHisOrHer] breath as [AttackerHeOrShe] taps the bottom of [AttackerHisOrHer] staff on the ground and... Nothing happens? [AttackerName] taps [AttackerHisOrHer]  staff a few more times in frustration, but [AttackerHeOrShe] seems to give up after a few more uneventful moments.
restraintEscaped: And breaks free, shattering the restraints into tiny motes of light!
restraintEscapedFail: But can't break free of the shining restraints!
